description:
Automatically builds and displays a prerequisite concept graph from knowledge base content. Shows what topics depend on others, and highlights gaps in user's current understanding based on their question history.

**Rationale:** Students often struggle because they're missing prerequisite knowledge. A visual dependency graph helps users understand learning sequences and identify foundational gaps they need to address first.
title: Interactive Concept Prerequisite Graph
